name: Bobo'sAdventure
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bobos adventure
des:
Join Bobo on a thrilling interactive adventure, supplying endless fun for children age 4-8. This delightful game, built in collaboration with a certified speech and language therapist, will support the development of a number of executive functions, including verbal memory, attention, and literacy development. 

Suitable for individuals or small groups, Bobo will provide the solution whenever boredom may strike!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
